original: @76b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @76b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: The practitioner who desires to accomplish the activities of the planets should be endowed with the commitments.

original: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar phris la seng ldeng gi phur bu brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi snying po so sor bris la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar phris la seng ldeng gi phur bu brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi snying po so sor bris la /
translated: Draw the ma·πá·∏çala as before, and write the essence mantras of the eight planets on eight kƒ´las of santalwood.

original: rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so //
analyzed: rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so //
translated: Anoint the tips with poison and blood, and place them in their individual places.

original: gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bsham mo //
analyzed: gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bsham mo //
translated: Arrange eight bali offerings adorned with various types of meat and blood.

original: dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa la yab yum gyi mtshan ma btab la snying po bsdus pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dra ba byung ste /
analyzed: dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa la yab yum gyi mtshan ma btab la snying po bsdus pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dra ba byung ste /
translated: Place the seal of the father and mother in the vase of the principal one in the center, recite the essence mantra one hundred and eight times, and generate the deity with a clear color and implements.

original: gza' so so'i snying ga nas bzung ste rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi mtha' grub par gyis shig par mnga' gsol /
analyzed: gza' so so'i snying ga nas bzung ste rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi mtha' grub par gyis shig par mnga' gsol /
translated: Light rays in the form of hooks emerge from the heart, take hold of the heart of each planet, and confer the empowerment to accomplish the activities of the yogin.

original: de nas gza' las chu 'grol ba la sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas /
analyzed: de nas gza' las chu 'grol ba la sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas /
translated: Then, whatever one is doing, such as releasing the water from the planets, one should recite the approach mantra one hundred times.

original: de nas sngags pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgya klag ste /
analyzed: de nas sngags pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgya klag ste /
translated: Then, the four mantrins should read the complete tantra three hundred times from the four directions of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: brgya tshigs kyis mchod bstod bya zhing /
analyzed: brgya tshigs kyis mchod bstod bya zhing /
translated: Make offerings and praises at the end of each hundred.

original: yab yum la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
analyzed: yab yum la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
translated: mantrin should supplicate the father and mother for whatever is desired.

original: de nas gza' brgyad kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i don khas blangs la gtor ma gtang zhing rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na 'grub par gdon mi za'o //
analyzed: de nas gza' brgyad kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i don khas blangs la gtor ma gtang zhing rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na 'grub par gdon mi za'o //
translated: Then, having accepted the meaning of the activity of the eight planets, one should offer a bali and apply it to the activity of the text as one wishes. There is no doubt that it will be accomplished.

original: gza' brgyad kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'i cho ga /'dod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gza' brgyad kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'i cho ga /'dod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The ritual for accomplishing the activities of the eight planets, called ‚Äúthe pacification of desire,‚ÄùüîΩis complete.

original: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: By the merit of my composition of this,üîΩmay all beings be happy.
